Acceptance of Terms

By using my website or services, you agree to the following terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use my website, service, or contact me for further assistance at lizartists@gmail.com.

Scope of Agreement

These terms and conditions apply to all users of my website and services, including visitors, users, and registered members.

Services

I offer a variety of logo and website design services, including:

  • Logo design
  • Website development
  • Photo editing
  • Graphic design

Payment

I require a deposit of 50% upfront before I begin work on any project. This can be flexible in some exceptions, like non-profit organizations, etc. The remaining 50% is due upon completion of the project and your approval of the final designs.

Refunds

I do not offer refunds for completed projects where the customer has agreed and the remaining payment was made. However, I will issue a refund for a project that has not yet been started or is in progress if you are not satisfied with the initial designs or project.

Intellectual Property

All intellectual property rights to the logos and websites that we create belong to the customer who pays. You are granted an exclusive and transferable license to use the logos and websites for your personal or business use. You are permitted to modify, distribute, or sell the logos and websites without permission.

Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law, I disclaim all warranties, express or implied, and assume no liability for any damages or losses arising from the use of my website or services.

Changes to the Terms of Service

I reserve the right to update these terms of service at any time. If I make any material changes to these terms of service, I will notify you by posting the updated terms of service on my website.

Contact

If you have any questions about these terms of service, please contact me at lizartists@gmail.com.
